Headline: #48 South Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Damen/47th
ShortDescription: SB 48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Ashland, 51st, and Damen due to construction near Damen/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Ashland, 51st, and Damen due to construction near Damen/47th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
